thread.title: Live updates as Nigel Farage prompts angry protests in Devon - Devon Live

author: Joel Cooper
title: Live updates as Nigel Farage prompts angry protests in Devon - Devon Live

organizations.name: east devon labour party's women's forum

text:
Live updates as Nigel Farage prompts angry protests in Devon
He's talking at a £45-a-ticket event which has completely sold out Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
Protesters have clashed with Euro-scpetics in a Devon town tonight as former UKIP leader Nigel Farage attends an event.
He is speaking at the "Audience with Nigel Farage" talk at Ocean in Exmouth. The £45-a-ticket event has completely sold out.
The East Devon Labour Party's Women's Forum have organised a demonstration outside the venue on the town's sea front. Nigel Farage submitted
The event will see the controversial Brexiteer talk about his life and career, as well as hosting a Q&A session with the audience.
Dilys Hadley, women's officer for East Devon Labour Party, said: "With all the current problems surrounding Brexit and the shocking rise in racism around the globe, we want to take a stand against people like Nigel Farage. Read More
"There's a determined group of us who feel this way and want to stamp these things out.
"That is why we are protesting."
We'll be reporting on the demonstrations, live updates will appear in the blog below: 21:51 Video from outside the venue 20:06 Protesters clash with Farage supporters
Protesters have been outside the venue chanting “No more hate, no more fear, Farage you’re not welcome here” Protesters clash with guests attending the 'Audience with Nigel Farage' event Protesters outside the 'Audience with Nigel Farage' event in Exmouth tonight 18:43 17:38 Tickets
Tickets for Mr Farage’s event cost £45 each - some think it’s a lot of money, but others snapped them up back in August! 17:33
A thick mist has appeared in Exmouth tonight... More On
